h1. Inherited Project Security

Inherit the security settings for a project from the server settings.  

h2. Version

Available from version 1.5

h2. Examples

{code:xml|borderStyle=solid}
<security type="inheritedProjectSecurity" />
{code}


h2. Configuration Elements

|| Element || Description || Type || Required || Default || Version ||
| type | The type of the project security. | String - must be inheritedProjectSecurity | Yes | _n/a_ | 1.5 |
| guest | The name of the account to use for guests.   | String | No | _None_ | 1.5 |
